Text: Duke Energy Trading and Marketing LLCpst I have two outstanding pricing issues that I tried to resolve with Gary Lamphier but didnt have any luck These deals are both day deals for February done by Danny Conner The customer is showing a pricing difference according to what we have in Sitara Can you please help me resolve this pricing issue Sitara Deal Sitara Price Customer Price

FW Deal pst Could you please help me out with this Ive called Gary Lamphier but no response and Client Services needs to get an answer Original Message From Mendoza Genaro Sent Monday June PM To Hernandez Elizabeth L Subject Deal Elizabeth Deal is a sale to BP Energy BP is claiming that this deal should have been invoiced by HPL and not ENA My contact also claims that this was confirmed by Gary Lamphier I am not sure if Gary is with ENA or HPL Is this something you can look into or do I need to send this to someone else Thanks Genaro

FW Mainland Energy LLC MarkupCan you verify the price for me on deal Original Message From Hernandez Elizabeth L Sent Wednesday June AM To Goodell Scott Subject FW Mainland Energy LLC Markup There is a price discrepancy with deal Mainline Energy LLC for You show a price of on one of the tiers and the customer is saying it should be Please verify and get back to me as soon as possible Original Message From Osire Ann Sent Tuesday June PM To Hernandez Elizabeth L Cc Osire Ann Subject Mainland Energy LLC Markup

Deal Validation Cc Effective immediately Sean Riordan X will be responsible for Deal Validation issues He is taking over all my current duties as I will be moving to a new group I will be helping Sean with Deal Validation issues until Please let your group know that they should now be calling Sean for assistance

FW ENA Upstream issuesPST FYI Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Wednesday August PM To Richardson Stacey Cc Hilliard Marlene Hernandez Elizabeth L Subject RE ENA Upstream issues Stacey I have reviewed all of the meter discrepancies and corrected them Elizabeth Hernandez is doing a great job of catching the deals as they are input and flagging them in Special handling as to which type of confirmationcontract should be used The process is getting better We have asked Nelson Ferries to input the well names in special handling if the deal is a first purchaser deal If he does not we are trying to catch them and get that information from him There is a new September file on the O drive named Upstream Confirms September All but of the deals for September have the meter information needed to send a confirmation I added a column from last month to indicate when the deal is on flex point and can be moved to a different pipe at our discretion We are going to add some language to the confirm for those As for the tax information I do not know what you need from me on that I do not have any tax information Do I need to work with tax to get something Again I want to thank you for working so hard to improve the process If you need anything else please let me know Thanks Judy Original Message From Richardson Stacey Sent Wednesday August PM To Thorne Judy Cc Hilliard Marlene Subject RE ENA Upstream issues Judy I think most of these issues were covered yesterday in the meeting I missed so sorry for that As Ellen has explained it to me we really dont have any tax reporting issues with gas purchased under the Wellhead Pooling Point GTC as we are not first purchaser We would like add these meters to those GTCs to be clean but its not needed IN GLOBAL CONTRACTS for scheduling or tax reporting I am concerned about the discrepancies between what Susan found on the deals and what is on the spreadsheet Ill be happy to go in and update information but Id rather have your OK on each of them I know youre busy but since Ellen is also using this info for the confirmations I dont want to change anything without your approval Please review all the comments in the meter field comments are in all fields with either a meter number name or pipe discrepancy and let me know which ones youd like us to change One last concern until Russ Severson is able to add a flag in Sitara indicating whether ENA Upstream is first purchaser or not the contracts group will not be able to tell which GTC to attach as the deals come across unless there is a comment or special handling Can you please make sure that all deals are input with information to indicate whether the contracts group should attach a Committed Reserves GTC a Wellhead Pooling Point GTC a GTC Firm until Gerald gets the new GTC version in place etc Marlene still needs tax information as she requested before We will still need full meter information for any committed reserves GTC or contract where we are first purchaser Please let me know if you have any questions I appreciate your help Thanks SBR x Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Tuesday August AM To Richardson Stacey Subject RE ENA Upstream issues Stacey Have these issues been resolved Judy Original Message From Richardson Stacey Sent Monday August PM To Thorne Judy Cc Bryan Linda S Green Joseph M Franklin Mary Theresa Hrna Sandra Subject ENA Upstream issues I just wanted to address a few issues I had mostly concerning severance taxes First of all I have come across some deals missing meter information that were either confirmed under Firm GTCs with tolerance language or Enfolio masters already in place Even if we did not use a Committed Reserves GTC or Committed Reserves Master we still may be liable for payment andor reporting of severance taxes Therefore we still need meter information on those deals Secondly to set up meters in Global Facilities for severance tax reporting Marlene needs certain tax information tax ID number well numbers as assigned by state taxing authority etc that should probably come from the producer Whose responsibility will it be to get that information from the operator Can Marlene let you know what she needs and have you work with the operator We want the information flow to be as smooth as possible and Im worried about having several different people try to work with the operator Lastly Marlene has found some meters listed that are not wellhead meters or producer connects Some of the meters she checked were interconnects pooling points etc which cannot be set up as severance tax points in the Global Facilities system Please work with her so that she has all the information she needs to set up wellhead metersproducer connects as needed Please let me know if you have any questions or need to discuss this information further We also probably need to include Mary Franklin in any discussions regarding taxes since I believe she will be handling the severance tax reporting in Unify Thanks Stacey Barclay Richardson Enron Net Works LLC Global Contracts Office Fax Pager

RE Jan Sales Price Discrp Cc Price changes have been made in Sitara Ellen please reconfirm deal and Original Message From Nelson Doug Sent Thursday May PM To Hernandez Elizabeth L Cc Lenhart Matthew Baxter Bryce Saladino Jane Subject Jan Sales Price Discrp Elizabeth Matt has given me verbal approval to have you change the pricing on the following transactions SITARA should be Currently it is SITARA should be Tiered RateStep mmbtuday mmbtuday Please see the original emails below I would like to get this booked in May accounting so let me know as soon as I can redraft Thanks Doug x Forwarded by Doug NelsonNAEnron on PM Doug Nelson AM To Matthew nronXGate cc Bryce CT Jane S CT Subject Jan Sales Price Discrp Matt Attached are the audio tapes from PGE regarding two Jan sales price discrepancies The vs issue relates to SITARA first audio file below Allen King has said there is no way he would have paid at MALIN on that day Please see rows on my attached spreadsheetis it possible that SITARA was copied from SITARA but the price is different The second audio file below relates to SITARA where Allen says the is at We show the whole day at see rows of my attached spreadsheet Please adviselet me know if you have trouble playing the audios Thanks Doug x File PGE Jan UNIFY Salesxls Forwarded by Doug NelsonNAEnron on AM Butler Melissa on PM To cc Subject Jan PGEMalin Pricewav PGEMalin Price wav The first is the and the second is the File PGEMalin Pricewav File PGEMalin Price wav Embedded Picture Device Independent Bitmap Embedded Picture Device Independent Bitmap

Cc PST Attached please find a counterparty list with erms code that could be useful to each of you when entering deals in Sitara and in Tagg These counterparties names are used across all desks If I have left out anyone that you feel could use this list please forward to that person

FW CES DealsPST FYI Original Message From BalfourFlanagan Cyndie Sent Thursday July AM To Wallumrod Ellen Hernandez Elizabeth L Cc Dickson Stacy E Hodge Jeffrey T Baxter Bryce Anderson Bridgette Bryan Linda S Campos Sylvia A Elledge Susan Gonzales Sharon Hilliard Marlene Landau Georgi Richardson Stacey Subject CES Deals I know that the confusion around CES seems to linger without hope of ever going away Well there may be light at the end of this seemly never ending tunnel We are in the process of terminating nonassigned CES contracts This due to the fact that ENA is not party to these agreements are only acting as agent on behalf of CES in short We are not CES We don not want to be CES we are Enron North America Corp BE ENRON PROUD o Based on this New deals should not be negotiated or entered into Sitara as CES Counterparty and CES deals should not be extended If negotiations or customer relationships are ongoing with these CES counterparties they should either return consent on the CES agreement or have a new ENA agreement put in place and then managed as ENA not CES Within the next week all CES contracts those for which ENA has not received consent will be suspended in Global and therefore not available to Sitara Unify will be able to continue to settle any existing deals under CES but Sitara will not allow a deal to be amended and reconnected to the CES contract without prior coordination and approval of legal where deemed applicable Furthermore we will not be generating GTC under CES to create a Sitara record for the CES deal to connect to Desk changes deal corrections may continue where appropriate but again there will need to be prior coordination with the Global Contracts group Corrections do not mean deal extensions or deal rollovers or new deals This information has been confirmed the intent approved by legal The reason for this again is We are not CES and these deals need to be moved off of the CES books and onto ours if the negotiations and relationships with the counterparty are ongoing If you have any questions please feel free to contact me at or you may also contact Stacy Dickson or Jeff Hodge in legal Thank you Cyndie

RE Ameren deal Her address is Ameren Energy Fuels and Services Company as agent for Union Electric Company Chouteau Ave MC St St Louis MO Original Message From Mims Patrice L Sent Monday October AM To Hernandez Elizabeth L Subject RE Ameren deal Hey Lizzie what is her address I forgot I need to send her a business card Original Message From Hernandez Elizabeth L Sent Monday October AM To Mims Patrice L Subject RE Ameren deal Yes this is an Enron company Youre right just like old shoes and I hope everyone is well taken care of Original Message From Mims Patrice L Sent Monday October AM To Hernandez Elizabeth L Subject RE Ameren deal Get out of here Is this an Enron company If so I am so happy for you Lizzie I will certainly miss you You and I have been working together for years and its just been so comfortable just like old shoes I wish you well and I know youll do a great job Original Message From Hernandez Elizabeth L Sent Monday October AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Ameren deal The confirmation for deal was faxed this morning to Emma I called her and left her a message that if the confirmation was not received to please get back with me I also wanted to let you know that October nd is my last day I have accepted a position with Freight Markets I am in the process of training Sean Riordan who will be taking my place

RE Deal Confirm for Coral Energy Canada Cc There is no counterparty set up in the system as Coral Canada US Inc The deals that Ann sent to me were not changed because the counterparty name was not set up and address information was not sent to me with the corrected confirmations These were sent back to Ann As far as I know the Trader did not give me any information on the counterparty name and address information If you have received this information on your end then I would suggest that you send in a GCP request so that Global Counterparty can set the counterparty up in the database Once this is done then you would need to send Sean the deal numbers that need to be changed Vladi should the counterparty name be Coral Canada US Inc Original Message From Dozier Scott Sent Monday October AM To Riordan Sean Cc Hernandez Elizabeth L Pimenov Vladi Subject Deal Confirm for Coral Energy Canada Sean Elizabeth should be familiar with what I will be refering to in this note so please reference her if need be There are several ENA sales for Sep production to Coral Energy Canada Inc which the counterparty is claiming should be billed under Coral Canada US Inc The counterparty will not pay on these items until corrected In fact the counterparty faxed back our confirmation with the requested change back in September Ann I dont know eher last name with ENA physical confirmations said that she was aware of these confirmations and that they had been forwarded to Elizabeth for her attention It is my understanding that once noted that there was actually no counterparty in our systems under this new name the traders for each company should have been in contact to straighten this out I am unaware of that occuring or even if that is the correct procedure I am ccing Vladi Pimenov because Sitara shows him as having created at least one of the deals Maybe he can clarify things for us One example of such deals is Bottom line is I need a way of receiving payment from Coral on these items All please advise Scott Dozier Client Services Settlements Enron Net Works LLC office fax email
The cashout deals are as follows
